column1: BEIJING—Apple Inc. Chief Executive Tim Cook will co-chair the Chinese government’s showcase global business forum next month
column2: underscoring his increasingly high profile here as Apple and other companies wrestle with tough new government demands on cybersecurity.

column1: In helping lead the China Development Forum in March
column2: Mr. Cook would be making his fifth appearance at a newsmaking event in China in little over a year.

column1: The development forum is a sought-after venue for the world’s business elite due to the rare access it offers to...to...
